Doc: A type for defining ISDA 2002 Equity Derivative Representations.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type for defining ISDA 2002 Equity Derivative Representations.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.Representations {
  # If true, then non reliance is applicable.
  nonReliance : boolean

  # If true, then agreements regarding hedging are applicable.
  agreementsRegardingHedging : boolean

  # If present and true, then index disclaimer is applicable.
  indexDisclaimer : boolean?

  # If true, then additional acknowledgements are applicable.
  additionalAcknowledgements : boolean

}

nonReliance.Doc: If true, then non reliance is applicable.
nonReliance.Name: nonReliance

agreementsRegardingHedging.Doc: If true, then agreements regarding hedging are applicable.
agreementsRegardingHedging.Name: agreementsRegardingHedging

indexDisclaimer.Doc: If present and true, then index disclaimer is applicable.
indexDisclaimer.Name: indexDisclaimer

additionalAcknowledgements.Doc: If true, then additional acknowledgements are applicable.
additionalAcknowledgements.Name: additionalAcknowledgements
